General.Name: Kunwu Jiuding Investment Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Kunwu Jiuding Investment Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the private equity investment management business primarily in China. It also provides real estate development and operation services. The company was formerly known as Jiangxi Zhongjiang Real Estate Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kunwu Jiuding Investment Holdings Co., Ltd. in December 2015. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Nanchang, China. Kunwu Jiuding Investment Holdings Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Jiangxi Zhongjiang Group Co., Ltd.

2.Name: Mr. Ling Jie  Yi
2.Title: CFO, Deputy GM, Board Sec. & Director

3.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
